title: Seasons Of The Soul: A Bishop's Letters
description: A journal of timeless inspiration and Spiritual letters, gathered over many years, from a contemporary Bishop to her clergy and congregation. Her letters are comprised of questions and statements based on insight and experience encompassing meditation and prayer; time and eternity; science and religion; mysticism; Love, Light and Truth; the Christ; and The One Of Many Names. Bishop Michelina offers a rare glimpse into the genesis of Aquarian Consciousness and the pulse of the Universal Heart.
author: + Michelina T Foster
